mapper.sql:
select table_name AS 'tableName',create_time AS 'createTime', engine, table_collation AS 'tableCollation', table_comment AS 'tableComment' from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database())
AND table_name like CONCAT('%', #{tableName}, '%')
order by create_time desc
mapper.select: select #{tableName} AS 'tableName', column_name, is_nullable <=> 'NO' AS 'notNull', data_type AS 'columnType', column_comment AS 'remark', column_key AS 'keyType', extra from information_schema.columns where table_name = #{tableName} and table_schema = (select database()) order by ordinal_position
